text:
1. Start by dropping the soccer ball from your hands.
2. Kick the ball with your foot to make it go up in the air.
3. Use your thigh to control the ball and keep it in the air.
4. Alternate between using your feet, thighs, and other body parts to juggle the ball.
5. Maintain a rhythm and continue juggling the ball without letting it touch the ground.
6. Challenge yourself by trying different juggling tricks, such as around the world or knee juggles.
7. Practice and improve your juggling skills by increasing the number of consecutive juggles you can perform.
